comments.body: This is strange. Screen sharing of the flatpak version does not work, unless I use this project and set these variables.

OK. The flatpak verion does have the opencv, libportal, libXdamage under its `lib` directory. But I don't know why its screen sharing does not work. I know it uses X11 under the hood. Can any one tell me how to use it without using this repo's hook?
OK. I finally found out that I mistakenly override the LD_PRELOAD. Reset it and the screen sharing works.
